symbols-description: Fast-paced action-puzzle game for iOS with dazzling colorful explosions and never-ending combos!
loopy-boy-description: Game made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 47 game jam.
raytracer-ts-description: Ray tracer software implemented entirely from scratch (including the math library) in Typescript.
year-in-pixels-react-description: Keep track of how you felt during the year. React app I made for learning purposes. Unit testing with Jest.
tic-tac-toe-ai-description: AI program that plays Tic-tac-toe against a human adversary using classic techniques like Minimax and Alpha-beta pruning. Written in C++.
yggdrasil-description: Game made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 30 game jam.
